key_risks: Financial volatility and declining revenue projections
Quality control issues with service professionals
Criticism of subscription model by service providers
Regulatory and competitive pressures in the home services industry
controversies: Allegations of suppressing negative customer reviews
Persistent customer complaints about unreliable leads and billing discrepancies
social_issues: Ethical concerns over transparency and consumer trust
Dissatisfaction among service professionals with the subscription model
governance_issues: Handling of customer complaints and reviews
Potential lack of effective vetting and management of service providers
